content.rendered:
TOP BEAUTY & FASHION BLOGGER FAVORITES

I have been searching long and hard to find the perfect nude pumps to elongate my legs with no luck. Every designer shoes I tried were always a bit off or did not have my shade. I’m happy to say I have finally found the perfect nude shoes for all skin tones from Kahmune! Kahmune is a luxury footwear for all skin tones with over 10 shades of nude pumps that perfectly match you. D’Lashes is honored and excited to become the embassador of such an amazing forward-thinking company. To shop Kahmune shoes just click on any picture or click here. Also, don’t forget to give them a follow on Instagram @kahmune

Also, my favorite fashion and beauty products that are currently on my shopping list. To shop just click on the name 1 “The Look” my favorite look this season is snakeskin print pants.They will elevate any look and you can dress then up or down. FWRD.COM 2 The belt bag is a must-have and I love this one from Gucci. Get it before it sells out! 3 The perfect nude shoes for all skin tones Kahmune.com 4 No need for jewelry when you have a belt as beautiful as this from Givenchy. 5 Is my favorite D’Lashes.com lash kit! 6 And my brand new creamy eyeshadows that are sure to be your favorite beauty product! 7 The ugly sneaker trend is blowing up! All the top fashion bloggers can’t wait to get their hands on these Balenciaga sneakers!

LOVE DIONNE
